TopicTitle: How to create custom explosion model in BDArmory

Articles.Content:
So i had all the information to create a mod about explosion but i don't know how other modder create explosion model.I try to import the model to blender through blender add-on but when i import it I see nothing but a six axis cross.Please help,here the image link 

https://sites.google.com/view/mod-development-debug/home
